pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dict.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/dict/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install dict```#### Features***attribute-style access*** **None** instead of **KeyError*** safe **remove*** jQuery like **methods chaining**#### Examples```python>>> from dict import dict>>> dict(k="v")["k"]"v">>> dict(k="v").k"v">>> dict(k="v")["not_existing"]None>>> dict(k="v").not_existingNone>>> dict(k="v").get("K",i=True) # case insensitive```

readme42.com
